#   Blizzard Entertainment Blocklist
#   
#   Blizzard Entertainment is a major video game developer and publisher,
#   known for franchises such as World of Warcraft, Overwatch, Diablo, and
#   Hearthstone. Its servers handle multiplayer gaming, matchmaking, digital
#   distribution, and online services for millions of players worldwide.
#   
#   This blocklist contains IP addresses associated with Blizzard servers.
#   By using it, you can prevent Blizzard services from accessing your
#   server, blocking game traffic, updates, and online interactions from
#   their network.
